entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and local blowing snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
